This card provides {C} Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attached to it, it has no Retreat Cost.
As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, its Retreat Cost is {C} less for each Beldum on your Bench.
If this Pokémon's remaining HP is 100 or less, its attacks do 80 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
If you go second, and if this Pokémon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokémon or on your Bench.

If you go second, this Pokémon can evolve during your first turn.

Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.
Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards that have the word "Ball" in their name, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

Look at your face-down Prize cards. You may reveal an Ultra Beast card you find there, put it into your hand, and put this Beast Ball in its place. (If you don't reveal an Ultra Beast card, put this card in the discard pile.) Then, shuffle your face-down Prize cards.

•Shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

Choose an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a basic Energy card and switch it with that card. Shuffle the first Energy card into your deck.

Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
Between turns, put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX (both yours and your opponent’s).

product.sm7.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm
product.sm7.pcd.hydrofury.name: Hydro Fury
product.sm7.pcd.hydrofury.sell-text: Swampert’s Hydro Pump can pack a wallop—just pump up the power and let it rip! Throw everything you’ve got into the battle with the full rage of the Hydro Fury theme deck!
product.sm7.pcd.leafcharge.name: Leaf Charge
product.sm7.pcd.leafcharge.sell-text: Call on the strength and agility of Sceptile! Gather a growing storm of Grass and Lightning power, and then unleash a furious attack. Stay charged up with the Leaf Charge theme deck!
sleeve.sm7.etb.rayquaza.name: Elite Trainer Rayquaza Card Sleeves
